\chapter{Predictive Modelling}
\label{\detokenize{index:predictive-modelling}}\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:module-dummy_project_predictive_modeling}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!dummy\_project\_predictive\_modeling@\spxentry{dummy\_project\_predictive\_modeling}}\index{dummy\_project\_predictive\_modeling@\spxentry{dummy\_project\_predictive\_modeling}!module@\spxentry{module}}\index{main() (in module dummy\_project\_predictive\_modeling)@\spxentry{main()}\spxextra{in module dummy\_project\_predictive\_modeling}}

\begin{fulllineitems}
\phantomsection\label{\detokenize{index:dummy_project_predictive_modeling.main}}\pysiglinewithargsret{\sphinxcode{\sphinxupquote{dummy\_project\_predictive\_modeling.}}\sphinxbfcode{\sphinxupquote{main}}}{}{}
\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Main program of Crimes Predictive Modelling}

\sphinxAtStartPar
This function execute a predictive modelling process in which the crimes data set is grouped in time\sphinxhyphen{}space
basis, and a flag indicating violent crime or not is added. Then a machine learning model is trained to classify
the crimes registers into violent /non\sphinxhyphen{}violent crimes

\end{fulllineitems}



\chapter{Inference}
\label{\detokenize{index:module-dummy_project_inference}}\label{\detokenize{index:inference}}\index{module@\spxentry{module}!dummy\_project\_inference@\spxentry{dummy\_project\_inference}}\index{dummy\_project\_inference@\spxentry{dummy\_project\_inference}!module@\spxentry{module}}\index{main() (in module dummy\_project\_inference)@\spxentry{main()}\spxextra{in module dummy\_project\_inference}}

\begin{fulllineitems}

\sphinxAtStartPar
\sphinxstylestrong{Main program of Crimes Inference}

\sphinxAtStartPar
This function execute a inference procedure to decide whether a crime is violent or not based on the machine learning
model trained for classification

\end{fulllineitems}
